title: Understanding the significance of correlation coefficient
body:
Two studies report correlations between stress and sleep:
Study A: $$r$$ $$=$$ $$0.60$$, not significant (n $$=$$ 10)
Study B: $$r$$ $$=$$ $$0.30$$, significant (n $$=$$ 500)
Which finding provides stronger statistical evidence of a real relationship?
courseName: EEPL614 Quantitative Methods for Educational Leadership
